entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 2:53 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
